quality.title: Quality Policy
quality.description: Achieve excellence in our actions, with quality, safety, and profitability. (At Alcast, excellence means, among other practices, full commitment to meeting applicable requirements and continuous improvement of the QMS).

environmental.title: Environmental Policy
environmental.description: To be nationally recognized and by the community in which it operates as a company committed to environmental protection and the prevention of negative environmental impacts, ensuring business sustainability and profitability, meeting legal requirements, and continuously improving its environmental management system.

metadata.title: About Us | Alcast
metadata.description: Learn about Alcast's history, mission, vision, and values, a leader in the aluminum sector.

metadata.title: ESG | Alcast
metadata.description: Discover Alcast's sustainability and social responsibility initiatives.

metadata.title: LME - London Metal Exchange | Alcast
metadata.description: Follow daily metal prices at the LME (London Metal Exchange) and Dollar exchange rate.

metadata.title: Aluminum Coils | Alcast
metadata.description: Aluminum coils produced by continuous casting and cold rolling, with a final width of up to 1350 mm.

metadata.title: Patterned Aluminum Sheets | Alcast
metadata.description: Aluminum sheets embossed with anti-slip features, ideal for stairs, floors, and ramps.

metadata.title: Flat Aluminum Sheets | Alcast
metadata.description: Flat aluminum sheets with guaranteed flatness and thickness, produced with a natural finish.

metadata.title: Natural Aluminum Discs | Alcast
metadata.description: Aluminum discs for the production of household utensils, manufactured with a modern process ensuring mechanical properties.

metadata.title: Aluminum Roofing Sheets | Alcast
metadata.description: Lightweight and durable aluminum roofing sheets with excellent thermal reflectivity and corrosion resistance for long-lasting roofs.
